title: Strata Clean Energy Celebrates 15 Years of Innovation and Growth in Renewable Energy - Business Wire
summary: Strata Clean Energy is celebrating its 15th anniversary, having grown from a residential solar company to a leader in utility-scale clean energy solutions. The company boasts over 270 completed projects, 3,000 MW of solar energy, and 3,200 MWh of energy storage, with an ambitious development pipeline of 8,000 MW solar and 31,000 MWh battery storage.

title: Qcells North America Completes Dalton Factory Expansion - PR Newswire
summary: Qcells, a clean energy company, has completed a factory expansion in Dalton, Georgia, adding 2 gigawatts of solar capacity. This is the first expansion of a solar panel plant since the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) was passed and marks the first phase of Qcells' $2.5 billion investment in a fully integrated solar supply chain in the US.  The expansion created 510 new jobs and will manufacture two new solar products: the Q.TRON G2 residential solar panel and a bifacial panel for commercial and utility markets.
product_or_process: Q.TRON G2 residential solar panel and a bifacial panel

title: CICE Funds Innovation to Advance the Measuring, Monitoring, and Verification (MMV) of Carbon Management - Canada NewsWire
summary: The B.C. Centre for Innovation and Clean Energy (CICE) has allocated $2.82 million in funding to four companies in British Columbia developing solutions to measure, monitor, and verify (MMV) carbon emissions reduction, removal, and avoidance. The funding will accelerate the commercialization of these solutions, which are crucial for expanding the global carbon credit market and promoting investment in emissions reduction programs and technologies.
product_or_process: MMV technology for quantifying and validating carbon dioxide removal via carbon mineralization

title: Dover Fueling Solutions Launches DX Promote Auto, a New Industry-Leading Managed Media Service - PR Newswire
summary: Dover Fueling Solutions (DFS) launched DX Promote Auto, a managed media service for fueling and convenience retailers. This service provides retailers with pre-made advertising content to display on the DFS Anthem UX platform, aiming to drive in-store foot traffic and boost sales. The new service offers short-form infotainment, national promotions, and personalized banner ads, and is designed to save retailers time and improve the customer experience at the pump.

summary: Sungrow, a leading provider of solar inverters and energy storage systems, has achieved significant success in the Indian market through its 'Make in India' initiative. The company plans to introduce new residential on-grid and hybrid solutions at REI Expo 2023, demonstrating its commitment to technological innovation and meeting global standards. title: Lindsay Precast Announces the Launch of Lindsay Renewables - PR Newswire
summary: Lindsay Precast, a company specializing in engineered steel and precast concrete structures, has launched a new division called Lindsay Renewables. This division focuses on clean energy solutions and consolidates the company's decades of experience in the renewable energy sector.  Lindsay Renewables will provide a full range of services, including design, prefabrication, and integration of products like Battery Energy Storage Systems (BESS), electric vehicle charging platforms, and solar ballasts.

title: TWG Launches New Electric Winch - PR Newswire
summary: TWG, a division of Dover, has launched the dp EL22 Electric Winch, an industrial-grade electric winch with a 22,000 lb rated line-pull. This new winch offers higher performance and durability compared to consumer-grade electric winches, boasting a military-proven geartrain, high-efficiency DC motor, and weather-resistant electrical package. The EL22 is manufactured to SAE J706 standards and is available in both industrial and military variants.
